mapper.select: SELECT user.userId ,user.user_name,role.role_name,role.roleId,per.permissionsName ,per.perId,per.perRemarks FROM sys_user AS user, sys_role AS role, sys_permissions AS per, role_per, user_role WHERE user.userName=#{userName} AND user.userId=user_role.userId AND user_role.roleId=role.roleId AND role_per.roleId=role.roleId AND role_per.perId=per.perId
